articles.author: F1
articles.title: Vettel to drive Senna's McLaren MP4/8 in tribute to icon - Formula 1
articles.description: Sebastian Vettel will drive Ayrton Senna’s McLaren MP4/8 at the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix weekend, in a fitting tribute to the late F1 icon.
articles.content:
Sebastian Vettel will drive Ayrton Sennas McLaren MP4/8 at the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix weekend, in a fitting tribute to the late F1 icon.
